entry.title: San Jamar - Stainless Steel 2 Sided Tabletop Tallfold/JDN Napkin Dispenser - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Jamr
Type: Disposables
Price: 12.49

The San Jamar H900X tallfold two-sided tabletop napkin dispenser is a convenient and practical addition to any professional dining establishment. The 150 tallfold napkin capacity means that your dispenser can help keep dozens of hungry patrons clean without needing a refill. Its heavy gauge steel design resists rust, so it will have a long life of serving your customers.

Dimensions:
Width: 3 3/4"
Depth: 4"
Height: 7 1/2"

entry.title: Frost - 195 - Table Metal Dispenser For JDN Junior Dispenser Napkin - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frost
Type: Disposables
Price: 32.99

Site Location: Economical table napkin dispenser comes in three finishes to suit both institutional and commercial applications.

Features:  Spring loaded pressure plates provide consistent dispensing of napkins. Dual sided dispensing. Rubber feet to protect countertops.

Materials:  One piece die formed body of 22 gauge steel with slightly radiused corners.

Dispensing: Will accept all standard napkins.

Weight: 1 lbs. (0.5 kg.)

Dimensions: 3.75”L x 4”W x 7”H

Maintenance: Normal preventative maintenance and cleaning will keep Frost products functioning properly and may extend normal product life. Products should be wiped down with a damp soft cloth periodically. Approved stainless steel cleaner may be used to clean scuffs or fingerprints on stainless surfaces. Do not use harsh detergents or chemical cleaners.

entry.title: Cascades Pro - C431 Countertop Interfold Napkin Dispenser Grey - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cascades Pro
Type: Disposables
Price: 32.99

Cascades PRO Tandem® Countertop Interfold Napkin Dispensers provide the affordable, sustainable solution for all your napkin needs.

  • Colour:Grey
  • Item size: (Width x Depth x Height)8.3 x 16.3 x 6.5 in (21 x 41.5 x 16.5 cm)
  • UPC Code:0-67220-62431-7

Cascades PRO Tandem® countertop interfold napkin dispensers reduce consumption and waste by up to 25% compared to traditional napkin dispensers, providing users with an affordable and reliable dispenser option. Featuring one at a time napkin dispensing and a 600-napkin capacity, this dispenser can be counted on during peak periods, requiring fewer dispenser refills. Ideal for countertops in high-traffic retail and foodservice settings, this dispenser features a translucent cover to easily monitor napkin levels. Create a window of opportunity to connect with customers with OnDisplay™ and let your Cascades PRO Tandem® dispensers become powerful marketing tools.

entry.title: Cascades Pro - C440 Stand/Wall Interfold Napkin Dispenser Grey - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cascades Pro
Type: Disposables
Price: 37.99

The Cascades PROTandem® Stand/Wall Interfold Napkin Dispensers save space and cut waste and labor costs with one at a time napkin dispensing.

  • Colour:Grey
  • Item size: (Width x Depth x Height)9.1 x 12.4 x 20.3 in (23 x 31.5 x 51.5 cm)
  • UPC Code:0-67220-62440-9

Cascades PRO Tandem™ stand/wall interfold napkin dispensers cut waste and labor costs by delivering one napkin at a time, every time. Featuring a sleek and versatile design, this dispenser can be hung on the wall to free up counter space or set in a stand, making it the ideal choice for any venue in foodservice or retail settings. The 750-napkin capacity helps to extend napkin service through peak periods, while the convenient translucent cover makes it easy to see when it's time to reload. With our OnDisplay™ feature your Cascades PRO Tandem™ dispensers can become powerful marketing tools, providing a window of opportunity to connect with customers.

entry.title: MC - Kraft 2 Ply Interfold Dispenser Napkins - 6000/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 42.99

Offer your guests convenience and comfort with this single fold Kraft.

Great for restaurants, cafes, and outdoor events, this kraft napkin helps your basic table setting. With a classic, simple design you can use this napkin in a variety of venues, from a catered event to a casual diner. You can also use this economical, napkin to roll silverware for extra versatility in your busy establishment.

Smooth Sophisticated Material

Boasting a soft, absorbent construction, this napkin is a practical addition to any establishment. With its  design and large this napkin is perfect for cleaning up spills. It also easily covers patrons' laps to protect their clothing throughout their dining experience.

Great Value

Easily stock up on these economy napkins without breaking your budget! Whether you want to roll your silverware with these napkins or leave an extra stack of them at the table for convenience, they get the job done. Plus, they are a cost-effective solution for any restaurant or diner that wants to give out extra napkins without worrying about the cost!

Classic Color

Thanks to its natural color, the various hues of your dinnerware and tabletop decor will pop! You cannot go wrong with this universal color.

Pre-Folded

This napkin comes pre-folded for efficient preparation so you can keep buffet lines stocked or quickly add table settings at your event.

MC - 1 Ply Interfold Napkin 8.5" x 6.5" - 6000/Case

entry.title: MC - Wet Napkins 4" x 7" - 1000 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 14.49

These lemon scented moist towelettes / wet naps are a simple yet effective way to elevate the dining experience for your guests, whether they are dining in or out!

Perfect for serving along side messy finger foods like chicken wings, barbecue ribs, or crab legs, a moist towelette provides a method for quick and easy clean up that your guests will appreciate. Messy foods can leave guests' hands and faces covered in sticky sauces, but these towelettes enable them to immediately clean up without accidentally rubbing their dirty hands on your clean tables or bathroom doorknobs. Plus, they'll feel more comfortable and might decide to stay or order dessert!

Individually Packaged

Individually packaged in a special wrapper that keeps the wipes from drying out, these small wipes can be easily stored in wait staff's aprons and distributed to tables after delivering food, or placed in every carry-out bag as a courtesy for guests who are picking up orders.

Fresh Lemon Scent

Featuring a fresh lemon scent, these wipes clean without customers having to go wash their hands, making them convenient for cleaning up on the go. After use, the cleaned surfaces self-dry in seconds, leaving the skin feeling soft and smooth.

Outdoor Dining and Messy Foods

Especially useful for outdoor dining or food trucks when sinks aren't available, these thick, strong wipes get the job done and will leave your guests feeling clean and rejuvenated. If you are serving sauce-covered wings or seasoned hard-shell crabs at your establishment, your guests will be expecting moist towelettes to be provided.

entry.title: Lapaco - Welcome Placemats - 1000 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lapaco
Type: Disposables
Price: 23.99

Lapaco - Welcome Placemats - 1000 / Pack

Create a clean and inviting dining environment for your patrons with this paper placemat. Not only will it add a bright, fun look to your dining area with the beautiful  and elegant design "Welcome" scripted on it, but it will also create a sanitary, individual surface for your guests to enjoy a meal on. These are perfect to lay down to greet guests with a colorful and modern design to set a chic, stylish aesthetic as soon as they sit down at your table!

Whether you own an eatery or a business that holds private events, these decorative placemats will have your guests raving about your attractive table display. Made from durable paper, this placemat makes setting tables simple. It also helps to protect tables from spills and messes. These placemats are the perfect addition to any trendy coffee shop, eatery, bakery, or stylish store that holds private events for bridal showers, baby showers, and birthdays! When your guests have finished eating, it is conveniently disposable for easy clean up. To make your clean up even easier, pair this placemat with disposable table runners and tablecloths. Feel good about cleaning up knowing these placemats are both recyclable and eco-friendly!

Sanfacon - 9.5" x 13.5" - #504 - Chinese Red Zodiac Placemats - 1000 / Pack

Create a clean and inviting dining environment for your patrons with this paper placemat. Not only will it add a bright, fun look to your dining area with the beautiful  and elegant design "Welcome" scripted on it, but it will also create a sanitary, individual surface for your guests to enjoy a meal on. These are perfect to lay down to greet guests with a colorful and modern design to set a chic, stylish aesthetic as soon as they sit down at your table!

Whether you own an eatery or a business that holds private events, these decorative placemats will have your guests raving about your attractive table display. Made from durable paper, this placemat makes setting tables simple. It also helps to protect tables from spills and messes. These placemats are the perfect addition to any trendy coffee shop, eatery, bakery, or stylish store that holds private events for bridal showers, baby showers, and birthdays! When your guests have finished eating, it is conveniently disposable for easy clean up. To make your clean up even easier, pair this placemat with disposable table runners and tablecloths. Feel good about cleaning up knowing these placemats are both recyclable and eco-friendly!
